mapper.select: SELECT c.res_class_name "resClassName", listagg(r.res_class_name, ',') within group(order by r.res_class_name DESC) "resClassName2", r.lv || '' as "level", c.upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId", r.res_class_id "resClassId" FROM ( SELECT upper_res_class_id, res_class_name, res_class_id, level as lv FROM RESCLASS WHERE use_yn = 'Y' START WITH upper_res_class_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR res_class_id = upper_res_class_id ) r JOIN RESCLASS c ON r.upper_res_class_id = c.res_class_id GROUP BY r.lv, c.res_class_name, c.upper_res_class_id,r.res_class_id ORDER BY r.lv , c.res_class_name DESC

SELECT rc.upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId", rc.res_class_name "resClassName" , COUNT(*) AS "mappingNumberOfRes" FROM RESINFO r JOIN RESCLASS rc ON r.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id GROUP BY rc.res_class_name, rc.upper_res_class_id

select rcaa.upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId", rca.res_class_name "resClassName", rcaa.mappingNumberOfRes "mappingNumberOfRes" from resclass rca inner join (SELECT rc.upper_res_class_id, COUNT(*) AS mappingNumberOfRes FROM RESINFO r JOIN RESCLASS rc ON r.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id GROUP BY rc.upper_res_class_id)rcaa on rcaa.upper_res_class_id=rca.res_class_id

SELECT rc.res_class_id "upperResClassId", rc.res_class_name "resClassName", SUM(rr.aa) "mappingNumberOfRes" FROM resclass rc INNER JOIN ( SELECT rs.upper_res_class_id, SUM(r.aa) AS aa FROM resclass rs INNER JOIN ( SELECT rc.upper_res_class_id, rc.res_class_id, COUNT(*) AS aa FROM RESINFO r JOIN RESCLASS rc ON r.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id GROUP BY rc.upper_res_class_id, rc.res_class_id) r ON rs.res_class_id = r.upper_res_class_id GROUP BY rs.upper_res_class_id ) rr ON rc.res_class_id = rr.upper_res_class_id GROUP BY rc.res_class_name, rc.res_class_id

SELECT urc_name.res_class_name "topUpperResClassName", urc.res_class_name "upperResClassName", rc.res_class_name "resClassName", rc.res_class_id "resClassId", rc.use_yn "useYn", a.add_item_sn "addItemSn", ad.add_item_name "addItemName", ad.use_yn "addItemUseYn" FROM RESCLASS rc INNER JOIN RESCLASS urc ON urc.res_class_id = rc.upper_res_class_id INNER JOIN RESCLASS urc_name ON urc_name.res_class_id = urc.upper_res_class_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resclassasideinfomapping a ON a.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id LEFT OUTER JOIN additem ad ON ad.add_item_sn = a.add_item_sn WHERE rc.res_class_name = #{resClassName}
